scene.sd: In the cave, Zuko is keeping warm with Breath of Fire while Aang, now tied up, remains in the Spirit World.
scene.sp: Zuko I finally have you, but I can't get you home because of this blizzard. [Stands up and looks outside the cave.] There's always something. Not that you would understand. You're like my sister. Everything always came easy to her. She's a firebending prodigy, and everyone adores her. My father says she was born lucky. He says I was lucky to be born. I don't need luck, though. I don't want it. I've always had to struggle and fight and that's made me strong. It's made me who I am.

scene.sd: Cut to Aang entering the cave, filling it with light. Cut to Aang waking up, attempting to get out of his restraints and noticing Zuko.
scene.sp: Zuko Welcome back.
Aang [Cut to close-up of Aang as he narrows his eyes.] It's good to be back.
scene.sd: Aang airbends Zuko into a wall and propelling himself backward out of the cave. Cut to cave exterior. Close-up of Aang wriggling like a worm in an attempt to get away, only to be caught by Zuko.
scene.sp: Zuko [Zuko pulls Aang up by his collar as seen from behind Aang.] That won't be enough to escape.
Aang [On seeing Appa.] Appa!
scene.sd: Appa lands. Katara slides off. Close-up of Zuko.
scene.sp: Zuko [Throwing the tied-up Aang aside who yelps.] Here for a rematch?
Katara [Confidently while countering his fire blasts.] Trust me Zuko, it's not going to be much of a match.
scene.sd: Katara uses waterbending to launch Zuko into the air before plummeting him down to the ground, knocking him out. Close-up shot of Sokka running toward Aang to untie him with Zuko lying unconscious.
scene.sp: Sokka Hey, this is some quality rope!
Aang We need to get to the oasis; the spirits are in trouble!
scene.sd: Switch to a wide-view of the area with Aang airbending himself atop Appa. Close-up shot of Aang landing on Appa.
scene.sp: Aang Wait, we can't just leave him here.
Sokka Sure we can. Let's go.
Aang No, if we leave him he'll die.
scene.sd: Aang airbends himself off Appa and retrieves Zuko, bringing him to Appa.
scene.sp: Sokka [Sarcastically.] Yeah, this makes a lot of sense. Let's bring the guy who's constantly trying to kill us.

scene.sd: Cut back to Zhao who continues to flee only to be attacked by Zuko.
scene.sp: Zhao You're alive?
Zuko [Angrily.] You tried to have me killed! [Zuko attacks Zhao.]

Zhao [Close-up of Zhao's face.] Yes I did. [Zuko approaches Zhao as we see the giant energy form make its way toward the ocean.] You're the Blue Spirit, an enemy of the Fire Nation! You freed the Avatar.
Zuko I had no choice. [Zuko continues his attacks, but they are blocked by Zhao.]
Zhao You should have chosen to accept your failure; you're a disgrace. Then, at least, you could have lived! [Zuko and Zhao begin to fight.]
scene.sd: Cut to Zuko and Zhao fighting on a bridge. Zuko gains the upper hand and Zhao notices the moon has returned.
scene.sp: Zhao [Shot of the moon over Zhao's shoulder.] It can't be!
scene.sd: Zhao is consumed by the energy in the shape of a hand and dragged toward the water.
scene.sp: Zuko Zuko extends his hand to Zhao, offering help to his adversaryTake my hand!
scene.sd: Zhao considers it for a moment before retracting his hand and looking at Zuko in disgust. The energy plummets into the water, Zhao dragged along with it, and dissipates.
Cut to Zuko and Iroh on a raft floating away from the city.
scene.sp: Iroh I'm surprised Prince Zuko, surprised that you are not at this moment trying to capture the Avatar.
Zuko I'm tired.
